TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConcurrencyMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the concurrency options for the properties in a conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about how to use this enumeration in a schema, see [Conceptual Design (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c033ef58-d790-49c6-a849-85c7d01bf15c).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ConcurrencyMode Fixed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The property is always validated at write time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ConcurrencyMode None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The property is never validated at write time. This is the default concurrency mode.
